mapper.select: SELECT T.VDAY AS DATE,SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000 AS FVALUE,'DAY' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD') - 15 AND to_date(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') < TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY T.VDAY ORDER BY T.VDAY

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') AS WEEK_DATE, SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000 AS FVALUE, 'WEEK' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD') - INTERVAL '12 week' AND TO_DATE(T.VDAY,'YYYYMMDD') < TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD') group by SUBSTRING(T.vday,1,4)||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.vday,'YYYYMMDD'),'WW') ORDER BY week_date

SELECT SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) AS DATE,SUM(T.FVALUE)/10000 AS FVALUE,'MONTH' AS WD FROM insight_sendimentary_amount T WHERE SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD') - INTERVAL'12 MONTH','YYYYMM') AND SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('20180423','YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(T.VDAY,1,6)
